# RStudio Connect {#rstudio-connect background-color="#4D8DC9"}

## RStudio Connect

Another reason to run Server Status Reports! (new test for deprecated settings usage)
Programmatic Provisioning documentation and a workflow for generating the first user and API key
Revamp of the Audit log event documentation and addition of "event actor" context
Public Jobs API endpoints for enumeration, logs, primary error, and sending a process kill order request
Support for Connect configuration via environment variables
